definition: La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Simethicone helps break up gas bubbles in the gut.
sentences.chinese: 西甲硅油就能把肠道里的气泡弄破。

sentences.english: Cumulatively, the Premier League has the highest debt, followed by the Spanish Primera and then the Serie A.
sentences.chinese: 日积月累，英超有着最高的负债，然后是西甲和意甲。

sentences.english: It is certainly more competitive than the Portuguese league.
sentences.chinese: 西甲当然比葡甲更为激烈。

sentences.english: In short, order had been restored to La Liga. At least for now.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，西甲的秩序目前是恢复了。

sentences.english: And what about Manchester United’s La Liga double Barcelona?
sentences.chinese: 而与曼联同病相怜的，西甲的巴塞罗那境况又如何呢？

sentences.english: Outlasting it over the course of an entire La Liga season is entirely different.
sentences.chinese: 在整个西甲赛季的比赛里超过巴萨是另一回事。

sentences.english: He has made only one La Liga appearance for the Blancos.
sentences.chinese: 他只为球队在西甲联赛中出场过一次。

sentences.english: Cesc Fábregas will not follow Thierry Henry from Arsenal to La Liga.
sentences.chinese: 法布雷加斯将不会跟随亨利离开阿森纳去西甲。

sentences.english: He is Real Madrid's top assist-man and he currently leads the assists ranking in the Champions League.
sentences.chinese: 他是皇马的助攻王同时在助攻榜上领跑西甲。

sentences.english: On average, in Spain, injury time is about three minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在西甲，伤停补时平均为3分钟。

sentences.english: Capello has won La Liga twice with Real Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 卡佩罗在皇马曾经2次获得了西甲联赛的冠军。

sentences.english: The great clubs and players of Spanish football continue with La Liga racha.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙足球的伟大俱乐部好球员继续着西甲联赛。

sentences.english: For me the third Spanish team is Atletico Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 我认为西甲的第三支会是马德里竞技。

definition: Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
Serie A, the top division of the Italian football league system

pinyin: La1 si1 pa4 er3 ma3 si1

definition: Málaga, Spain/Malaga city in Iranian East Azerbaijan
La Coruña or A Coruña (city in Galicia, Spain)
Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
